I can ask - he generally avoids opinions if he hasn't seen patient info since he does recognize that EVERYONE is different and responds differently to different meds.
It boggles my mind that people go on and on about "eating healthy", "no red meat" (a good thing), and then shovel handfuls of "health food pills" without knowing their effect into their mouths.
For example, ginseng can cause Bleeding .... that's why a surgeon will Always ask if you are on medication prior to surgery. Â Many of these "harmless little herbs" are bombs waiting to happen. Â
